snippet.title: Into The Grid - Short Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Disclaimer: This footage is from a game currently under development.

This is a new glimpse into the gameplay of Into The Grid, the upcoming Cyberpunk Deckbuilder game by Flatline Studios.

Become a hacker and take down the evil mega-corporations that control the world in the year 2112.

Experience the first deck builder with true map exploration.

Follow our updates and wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2576200?utm_source=yt
